RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 60000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIROOVIN brushed the off side stall at the start and came under coaxing, raced four wide in aim of the leader, advanced in tandem with SPEAKINOFTHEDEVIL half a mile from home, tucked to the two path and dueled through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, floated six then five wide into upper stretch when under a left handed crop, rallied to take command a furlong from home, edged away under a drive kept to task. SPEAKINOFTHEDEVIL coaxed from the gate, chased briefly just off the inside in closest aim of the early leader before tipping to the three path and advancing strongly to take over command at the half mile pole, got joined by the aforementioned foe to the outside and knocked heads through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, tipped out a path to look GIROOVIN in the eye and was collared a furlong from home, ran on to chase the winner home well clear of the rest and along second best. FIGHT FIERCELY hustled from the start, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch and improved position to secure the show honors. SWAY'SINMYDNA stumbled at the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the stretch. GABE hustled from the gate, showed the way early on two to three wide, got displaced with a rush half a mile from home and quickly found himself chasing tucked inside through the turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Fight Fiercely
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, angled 4w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Speakinofthedevil
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds Pine Racing Stables and Titletown Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 2p briefly, 3w bid 1/2, duel turn, 2-3w uppr, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Gabe
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, led early 2-3w, headed 1/2, ins turn, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sway'sinmydna
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Giroovin
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp and Staudacher David
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate, 4w in aim, duel 2p turn, 6-5w uppr, edged away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 45000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Cl aim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOLLY MISS JILL went to the front, showed the way while well rated in the two path, was challenged on the far turn, responded well when asked approaching the quarter-pole, was given one pop of a right-handed crop in upper stretch then switched to a left-handed crop at the furlong marker, shook off the runner-up outside the sixteenth-pole and proved best under steady urging. YOGI went four wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the three path on the far turn, made a bid passing the five-sixteenths, came out while shying from a left-handed crop multiple times in upper stretch, shied in when switched to a right-handed crop inside the furlong marker and proved no match for the winner late while well clear for the place. HANDLE THE TRUTH settled on the inside, was roused on the far turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and lacked the needed response then just held the show. SUSIE'S SAVER was a bit awkwardly into stride, rounded the first turn in the two path, settled towards the rear, moved closer with five furlongs to run, was urged three wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and just missed the show. BRAVO REGINA bumped with a rival at the start, raced in the two path early on the first turn, moved to three then four wide later on that bend, settled outside under some urging, chased four wide on the far turn and came up empty. JOEY THE FISH dropped back while showing no speed then angled quickly to the inside, saved ground at the rear through the far turn and was no factor. JACKSON AVENUE went four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was urged along late on the backstretch, dropped back four wide on the far turn and failed to respond. ALICE KRAMDEN bumped with a foe at the start, traveled three wide on the first turn, was well placed just off the pace while inside of an opponent, went around the far turn in the two path under urging and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Handle the Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside,urged 2nd turn,lacked needed response,held show

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Saver
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled,closer 5/8,urged 3w2nd turn,5w1/4,missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Jolly Miss Jill
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed way 2path,asked 1/4,responded,shook foe,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Bravo Regina
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,2-4p1st,outside,chased 4w2nd turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Alice Kramden
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,3w1st,well placed,urged 2p2nd turn,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Jackson Avenue
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w1st,settled outside,urged 1/2,4w2nd turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Yogi
ENTRY.OWNER: New Phoenix Stable Bozarth Tom Tango Uniform Racing LLC and Stillman Philip
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4p1st,stlkd outside,ask3p2nd,bid5/16,drifted from whip,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Joey the Fish
ENTRY.COMMENT: slowest into stride,angled in,inside turns,no factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. INNER TURF (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB)(UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONA L CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over On The Turf In 2023 Allowed 4l bs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUNSET LOUISE broke out at the start, raced three then two wide through the opening bend settling to show the way rated four then three wide down the backstretch, suddenly shied out a path just inside the nine-sixteenths and had the rider apply a tap of the crop to the right shoulder to correct, widened away in hand through the far turn given a notch to work with while just off the inside, swung three wide into upper stretch, got briefly roused near the eighth pole drawing off before being geared down through the final sixteenth to prevail comfortably on the line. SKRATCH KAT chased two to three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while well clear of the remaining rival. LINNY KATE along the inside through the opening bend, chased four then three wide down the backstretch before tucking to the two path with nine-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide for home and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Linny Kate
ENTRY.OWNER: Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and PlayingTheField Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins early, chased 4-3w, to 2p 9/16, coaxed 7/16, 3w uppr, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Skratch Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, angled 5w upper, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Louise
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, rated 4-3w, shied out 9/16, 3w uppr, drew off, gear down

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $14,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Cl aim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENSIGN PARKER pressed the pace on the outside, took the lead in the three path midway through the turn, shook clear approaching the quarter-pole, drifted out under a left-handed crop in upper stretch then switched to a right-handed crop and drew off under steady urging. LET FREEDOM SPRING pressed the pace on the inside, dropped back late on the backstretch then moved out, shifted from the two path to the four path early on the turn, chased the leader on the outside, spun five wide into the stretch and safely secured the place while no match for the winner. CHARGER went to the front, set the pace under pressure from both sides, was headed under urging while inside midway through the turn, dropped back coming to the quarter-pole and tired but held the show. HEREBY was urged along off the pace, went three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch, remained on his inside lead in the drive and failed to threaten. PRINCE OF JOY was urged along towards the rear, rounded the turn in the two path, spun three wide into the stretch, dropped back while remaining on his inside lead to near the sixteenth-pole and capitulated. MERCHANTS OF COOL broke near the back then settled at the rear of the field, went three to four wide early on the turn, dropped in later on the bend, reached the rail outside the quarter-pole and was no factor. NORGAY was last to commence then hustled, raced on the outside while ridden along, lugged out from four to six wide on the turn, floated eight wide into the stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Let Freedom Spring
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed ins,drop back 1/2,2-4path turn,chased,5p1/4,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Merchants of Cool
ENTRY.COMMENT: off near back, settled, 3-4wide, rail outside 1/4, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Charger
ENTRY.OWNER: La Marca Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,headed rail turn,tired,held show

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,2path turn,3path into lane,ins lead to 1/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Ensign Parker
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,took lead 3path turn,clear1/4,drift out,drew away

ENTRY.NAME: Hereby
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,3wide turn,5w into lane,inside lead,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Norgay
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,hustled,ridden along outside,lug out 4-6p turn,8p,faltr

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALWAYS A WARRIOR hustled from the gate, showed the way in hand three then two wide, had the rider show the crop underhanded to the right side with five-sixteenths to go, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, drew off under a drive, then dug in and held safe to the finish. MAMA'S MIDDIE a bit fractious in the gate prior to the start, was backed out and reloaded, chased three to four wide from the tail of the field coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch, closed well to secure the place honors drifting inwards a bit green late. COLLECTED SPECIAL bobbled at the break, chased three then two wide coaxed along from the get go, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. DIXIE PHARAOH coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coaxed along from the get go, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. A KNIGHT'S COURAGE coaxed along in pursuit five then four wide from just off the pace, cornered five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. ALBEDO broke inwards striking the near side stall at the start, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and offered no rally. JAKE'S ORCHARD shied in at the start, chased four then three wide down the backstretch before tucking to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no response. KHADULLAH coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. ICE THE KICKER coaxed from the start, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, tipped four wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Khadullah
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez, Rudy R. and Imperio, Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mama's Middie
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie Pharaoh
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC and Hoffman Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, coaxed along inside, ins 1/4p, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Albedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Jake's Orchard
ENTRY.COMMENT: shied in st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 2p 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Collected Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased coaxed along 3-2w, 2w 1/4p, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Ice the Kicker
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 7/16, 4w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Always a Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, in hand 3-2w, 2w 1/4p, drew off, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: A Knight's Courage
ENTRY.OWNER: Brady Horse Racing and Rusba V Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed along 5-4w in pursuit, 5w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 89. Maiden Claiming Purse 60000. INNER TURF (UP TO $10,440 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $75,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HE'S GOT SWAGGER went five then four wide on the first turn, was urged along while well off the pace, gained momentum while three to four wide on the far turn, closed fast six wide into the stretch, took the lead near the three-sixteenths and drew away under steady urging. DR KRINGLE rounded the first turn in the two path, was well placed behind the leading quartet, rallied four to five wide on the far turn, made a bid coming to the quarter-pole, battled with the winner briefly in upper stretch and proved no match while clear for the place. ROCKSTAR RED went four wide on the first turn, raced up close to the pace, chased four then three wide on the far turn and weakened while clear for the show. RINGSIDE disputed the pace in the two path, was urged along on the far turn, dropped back into upper stretch and tired. GOLD TEMPLAR dropped from the three path to the rail on the first turn, lagged at the rear, raced inside to the two path on the far turn and was no factor. DREAMWITHINADREAM went three wide on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside, came up empty in the three path on the far turn and capitulated. LASTLY disputed the pace on the inside of foes, dropped back near the five-eighths pole, came up empty on the far turn and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Rockstar Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w1st,up close,chased 4-3path 2nd turn,weakened,held show

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Kringle
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,well placed,rally4-5w2nd turn,bid1/4,no match,clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Lastly
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace,ins foes,drop back 5/8,empty 2nd turn,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Templar
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p-rail 2nd turn,at rear,ins-2path 2nd turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Ringside
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,disputed pace,urged 2p2nd turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamwithinadream
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,tracked outside,empty 3p2nd turn,capitulated

ENTRY.NAME: He's Got Swagger
ENTRY.OWNER: Magdalena Racing (Sherri McPeek) C and H Diamond Racing LLC and Riccio Alfred
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4w1st,urged along,3-4w2nd,rallied,6w1/4,lead3/16,clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1 3/16M Dirt CR: 102. Allowance Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB)(UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non- winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUSTER brushed the near side stall at the start, chased along the inside from just off the pace, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out six wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, edged clear under a drive kept to task. FILM STAR prompted the pace of SAQEEL from the outside three then two wide, got shown the crop to the right side through the far turn and came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, took over command straightened away, dug in under threat and was caught a furlong from home, ran on to secure the place honors. SAQEEL coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, yielded the front straightened away, weakened in the late stages while along for the show honors. PLEDGEOFALLEGIANCE three wide through the first turn, chased four wide down the backstretch and then three wide through the far turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went eight wide into upper stretch, improved position to the finish. PROVE WORTHY chased along the inside early on before tipping to the two path down the backstretch, went four wide at the half mile pole placed to coaxing, angled five wide into upper stretch and made no headway. THE PRINCE'S SPUR coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside from just off the pace, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, went seven wide into upper stretch and weakened. COMPLETE AGENDA three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Prove Worthy
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins early, 2p backstretch, tip 4w 1/2, 5w uppr, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Ouster
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 6w uppr, up 1/8, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: The Prince's Spur
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Complete Agenda
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Saqeel
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, yielded, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Film Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, up, collared 1/8, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Pledgeofallegiance
ENTRY.OWNER: Sussman Jeremy Ten Strike Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w both turns, 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, 8w upper, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 108. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 162500. (PURSE $125,000 FOR NON-NYB)(UP TO $28,275 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 202 3 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5%A ftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAKATOMI showed speed between foes then settled just off the pace, drafted in the two path on the turn, dropped to the rail while asked at the quarter-pole, rallied inside through a clear opening to get the lead inside the furlong marker, shook clear coming to the sixteenth-pole and proved best under good handling. SHERIFF BIANCO was hustled from the gate then coaxed along on the outside, chased in the four path on the turn, made a bid while driven six wide into upper stretch, battled outside of three foes into the final furlong and proved no match for the winner while just able to get the place. BABY YODA showed speed between foes, vied in the two path while asked on the turn, turned three wide into upper stretch on even terms for the lead, battled under a drive into the final furlong and weakened then just missed the place while able to get the show. SHOOTERS SHOOT was sent from the start, showed speed on the outside then pressed the pace, vied in the three path on the turn, spun five wide into the stretch, battled under a drive into the final furlong and tired. BOURBON CALLING was hustled from the gate then coaxed along on the outside, went three wide on the turn and failed to rally. MR PHIL was hustled from the start, contested the pace on the inside, dropped back near the five-sixteenths and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Phil
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Madaket Stables LLC Casal Jorge and Estate of Ira Davis
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,inside pace,drop back 5/16,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Nakatomi
ENTRY.OWNER: Qatar Racing LLC and Hay Mrs Fitriani
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed btwn,settled,draft 2p turn,rail1/4,rallied,lead ins1/8,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Yoda
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable Barber Gary and Zaro Jerold L
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed btwn,asked 2p turn,vied past 1/8,3p1/4,weakened,lost place

ENTRY.NAME: Shooters Shoot
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent,speed outside,pressed,vied 3path turn,5p1/4,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sheriff Bianco
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed,chased 4path turn,6w into lane,bid,no match,earned2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Calling
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,coaxed outside,3wide turn,no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Quick Call S. Presented by the Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation SARATOGA RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 99. Stakes Purse 175000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNCASHED hustled from the gate, showed the way three then two wide lightly coaxed along, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, took to the inside straightened away and drew off under a drive to prevail. JOEY FRESHWATER four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one, ran on to secure the place honors clear of the rest. TWO OF A KIND chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened while along for the show honors. ACOUSTIC AVE coaxed from the start, raced five paths off the inside in aim of the leader before advancing tucked three wide through the turn to prompt the pace from the outside, continued three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. BRITERDAYZAHEAD chased three to four wide down the backstretch and then four to five wide through the turn coaxed along from three furlongs out, went five wide at the head of the stretch, tired. KIGALI chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, tired in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Kigali
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 7/16, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Two of a Kind
ENTRY.OWNER: K and R Racing Stable and Town Branch Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Briterdayzahead
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 4-5w 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Uncashed
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, lightly coaxed 3-2w, 2w 1/4p, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Joey Freshwater
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Acoustic Ave
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 5w in aim, prompted 3w turn, 3w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGGIE bumped lightly with a rival at the start, was taken in hand off heels briefly early then settled under some urging, pursued the leader under a strong hand-ride while four then three wide on the turn, made an outside bid into upper stretch, dueled with the runner-up to the finish and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. MARLEY'S GHOST bumped lightly with a foe at the start, tracked the pace down the backstretch, chased in the two path through the turn, made a bid into upper stretch, dueled inside of the winner, drifted out late and just missed while well clear for the place. NORTHWAY was hustled from the gate then urged along off the pace, went three wide on the turn, was driven four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. SHE'S A NINE bumped with a rival at the start, angled in while going to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, dropped from the three path to the two path on the turn, lost the advantage into upper stretch and tired. CAUSE I'M ELEGANT dropped back near the five-eighths, went three then two wide on the turn and never reached contention. MAGNOLIA WIND was urged along off the pace, saved ground on the turn, came out into the stretch and failed to threaten. STRANGE FRUIT settled on the outside under some urging, went four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to respond. BELLA SONADORA dropped well behind, went around the turn in the two path and was no factor. IRISH EMPRESS bumped with a rival at the start, chased the pace down the backstretch, came up empty in the five path on the turn and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Northway
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Bison Stable and Hoffman Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,urged along,3wide turn,4w into lane,best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Magnolia Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,inside turn,came out 1/4,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk,in hand,settled,urged 4-3p turn,bid3/16,duel,up

ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk,tracked,chased 2p turn,bid3/16,dueled,denied
